contexts.context: ...Redwort is a herb grown by many residents of <mark>Valenwood</mark> for their beautiful and showy flowers. They attain...
...tuber that can be found in the Province of <mark>Valenwood</mark>. The plant is very difficult to find as...
...reason. Many Necromancers who practice our Arts in <mark>Valenwood</mark> become "one with the trees" themselves.
